verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> chish-Mo-a' heard כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all הַמְּלָכִ֡ים <S%H4428><s%> ham-me-la-Chim And it came to pass when all the kings אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver which [were] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <S%H8219><s%> u-vash-she-fe-Lah, and in the valleys וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all ח֚וֹף <S%H2348><s%> Chof and in all the coasts הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, of the great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> mul over against הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non; Lebanon הַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti the Hittite וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ve-Ha-'e-mo-Ri, and the Amorite הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> hap-pe-riz-Zi, the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusite

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yit-kab-be-Tzu That they gathered יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav, themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' with Joshua וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- and with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; and with Israel פֶּ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> peh accord אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. with one פ Peh

וְיֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei And when the inhabitants גִבְע֜וֹן <S%H1391><s%> giv-'on of Gibeon שָׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U, heard אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' what Joshua לִֽירִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> li-ri-Cho unto Jericho וְלָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> ve-la-'Ai. and to Ai

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su They did work גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> hem-mah like בְּעָרְמָ֔ה <S%H6195><s%> be-'a-re-Mah, wilily וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu and set וַיִּצְטַיָּ֑רוּ <S%H6737><s%> vai-yitz-tai-Ya-ru; and made as if they had been ambassadors וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu and took שַׂקִּ֤ים <S%H8242><s%> sak-Kim sacks בָּלִים֙ <S%H1087><s%> ba-Lim old לַחֲמ֣וֹרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2543><s%> la-cha-Mo-rei-Hem, upon their asses וְנֹאד֥וֹת <S%H4997><s%> ve-no-Dot bottles יַ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> ya-yin and wine בָּלִ֔ים <S%H1087><s%> ba-Lim, old וּמְבֻקָּעִ֖ים <S%H1234><s%> u-me-vuk-ka-'Im and rent וּמְצֹרָרִֽים׃ <S%H6887><s%> u-me-tzo-ra-Rim. and bound up

וּנְעָל֨וֹת <S%H5275><s%> u-ne-'a-Lot shoes בָּל֤וֹת <S%H1087><s%> ba-Lot And old וּמְטֻלָּאוֹת֙ <S%H2921><s%> u-me-tul-la-'Ot and clouted בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-lei-Hem, upon their feet וּשְׂלָמ֥וֹת <S%H8008><s%> u-se-la-Mot garments בָּל֖וֹת <S%H1087><s%> ba-Lot and old עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; on וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem upon them and all the bread צֵידָ֔ם <S%H6720><s%> tzei-Dam, meat יָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ya-Vesh was dry הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <S%H5350><s%> nik-ku-Dim. [and] mouldy

וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' to Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal; at Gilgal וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to him אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto him and to the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz country רְחוֹקָה֙ <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kah from a far בָּ֔אנוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-nu, We be come וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now כִּרְתוּ־ <S%H3772><s%> kir-tu- now therefore make לָ֥נוּ La-nu בְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> ve-Rit. ye a league

וַיֹּאמְרוּ vai-yo-me-ru כוַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer answer קאִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַחִוִּ֑י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi; unto the Hivites אוּלַ֗י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai, Peradventure בְּקִרְבִּי֙ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bi among אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev, ye dwell וְאֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich how; אֶכְרֹות־ 'ech-rot- כאֶֽכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> 'ech-rot- make לְךָ֥ <S%H3772><s%> le-Cha us and how shall we make קבְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> ve-Rit. a league

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha We [are] thy servants אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu; we וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֧ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem then יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem are you וּמֵאַ֥יִן <S%H370><s%> u-me-'A-yin unto them Who [are] ye;and from whence תָּבֹֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-'u. come

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz country רְחוֹקָ֤ה <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kah far מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od unto him From a very בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u are come עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha, thy servants לְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> le-Shem because of the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שָׁמַ֣עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu for we have heard שָׁמְע֔וֹ <S%H8089><s%> sha-me-'O, the fame וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah of him and all that he did בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim. in Egypt

וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, And all that he did לִשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei to the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver that [were] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; Jordan לְסִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> le-si-chOn to Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> chesh-Bon, of Heshbon וּלְע֥וֹג <S%H5747><s%> u-le-'og and to Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H6252><s%> be-'ash-ta-Rot. which [was] at Ashtaroth

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru spake אֵלֵ֡ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu about זְֽקֵינֵינוּ֩ <S%H2205><s%> ze-kei-nei-Nu Wherefore our elders וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants אַרְצֵ֜נוּ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tze-nu of our country לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, to us saying קְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu Take בְיֶדְכֶ֤ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-yed-Chem with you צֵידָה֙ <S%H6720><s%> tzei-Dah victuals לַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> lad-De-rech, for the journey וּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> u-le-Chu and go לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Tam; to meet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H559><s%> va-'a-mar-Tem them and say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to עַבְדֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5650><s%> 'av-dei-Chem unto them We [are] your servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu, we וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now כִּרְתוּ־ <S%H3772><s%> kir-tu- therefore now make לָ֥נוּ La-nu בְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> ve-Rit. ye a league

זֶ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh This לַחְמֵ֗נוּ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Me-nu, This our bread חָ֞ם <S%H2525><s%> cham we took hot הִצְטַיַּ֤דְנוּ <S%H6679><s%> hitz-tai-Yad-nu [for] our provision אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> o-To out מִבָּ֣תֵּ֔ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> mib-Bat-Tei-nu, out of our houses בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom on the day צֵאתֵ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> tze-Te-nu we came forth לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; to you וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold יָבֵ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ya-Vesh, unto you but now behold it is dry וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <S%H5350><s%> nik-ku-Dim. and it is mouldy

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These נֹאד֤וֹת <S%H4997><s%> no-Dot And these bottles הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> hai-Ya-yin of wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִלֵּ֣אנוּ <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le-nu which we filled חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> cha-da-Shim, [were] new וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <S%H1234><s%> hit-bak-Ka-'u; and behold they be rent וְאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these שַׂלְמוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8008><s%> sal-mo-Tei-nu and these our garments וּנְעָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5275><s%> u-ne-'a-Lei-nu, and our shoes בָּל֕וּ <S%H1086><s%> ba-Lu are become old מֵרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> me-Ro long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech journey מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. by reason of the very

וַיִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu took הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men מִצֵּידָ֑ם <S%H6718><s%> mitz-tzei-Dam; of their victuals וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi not [counsel] at the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo and did not שָׁאָֽלוּ׃ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'A-lu. and asked

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, peace וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot with them and made לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a league לְחַיּוֹתָ֑ם <S%H2421><s%> le-chai-yo-Tam; with them to let them live וַיִּשָּׁבְע֣וּ <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-ve-'U sware לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei and the princes הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah. of the congregation
